SAMPLE NOTES
TOPIC: whether to live in a dorm or an apartment
reasons for living in dorm:
she currently lives there
she is happy there
there is less work
reasons for living in apartment:
her friends want to
she wants to be with her friends
there are fewer rules
opinion:
good to live in place she wants to live in
better to live with people she wants to live with
